title: Your professional opinion. Just out of curiousity.
content:
Hello

Can you please give your professional opinion? I like both, but the process of finding the right one is rather difficult.

Thanks and regards,

Malika

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021013525im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_final_4265.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021013525im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cube_5290.jpg)
author: malika

comments.content:
Hello.

I like the square icon in the first sample... Im not sure about the type style on 'communication' or cube for that matter... consider a linear sans? DIN... Gridnik... The one below is a complete contrast with more an 'engraved style' should I say. Is there any reason for this?

What does the logotype have to say? It'd be nice to know a little more about your project...

--  
Rez +
These are drastically different. So, in terms of picking one, I think you need to better determine the audience they are for.
